output.sentences: The husband and wife walked down Pennsylvania holding hands, tanking in the sights of the National Mall.
The walk past the White House, they stop to take in the beauty and reflect on the history of the building.
They decide to visit the White House and take a tour.
Inside the White House they see the most beautiful Christmas tree, made of flowers.
They pose for a photo in front of the tree with other visitors.
